sqlMap.select: SELECT s.id AS id, s.image_url AS imageUrl, s.url AS url FROM t_bd_banner s WHERE s.type = 1 AND s.is_show = 1 ORDER s.sort_num ASC

SELECT s.id AS id, s.name AS name, s.type AS type, s.sort_num AS sortNum, s.image_url AS imageUrl, s.url AS url, s.is_show AS isShow, s.clicks AS clicks, s.description AS description, s.create_emp AS createEmp, s.create_time AS createTime, s.modify_emp AS modifyEmp, s.modify_time AS modifyTime FROM t_bd_banner s
sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_bd_banner (name, type, sort_num, image_url, url,is_show, clicks, description, create_emp,modify_emp) values (#name#,#type#,#sortNum#,#imageUrl#,#url#,#isShow#,#clicks#,#description#,#createEmp#,#modifyEmp#)
select LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
sqlMap.update: update t_bd_banner set name = #name#, type = #type#, sort_num = #sortNum#, image_url = #imageUrl#, url = #url#,is_show=#isShow# clicks = #clicks#, description = #description#, modify_emp = #modifyEmp# where id=#id#
UPDATE t_bd_banner t set t.clicks = +1 where id = #id#
